import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; export default function ForgotPassword() { const navigate = useNavigate(); // Hook for navigation const handleResetPassword = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); // Prevent default form submission alert("If this email is registered, you'll receive a password reset link shortly."); setEmail(''); // Clear email field }; return (
{/* Left Section */}

KisanKart (KK)

Reset your password and regain access to your account.

{/* Right Section */}

Forgot Password

Enter your registered email address and we will send you a link to reset your password.

setEmail(e.target.value)} required />
); }
